message: Let's split it down the middle, fair and square.
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not giving you the majority.  Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better.
I'm starting to get tired of this back and forth. Let's just call it a deal and split it almost evenly.
You're running out of time, I'm not getting any less patient.
